text: Lisa Christine Schuster (born 28 May 1987) is a German ice hockey player for OSC Berlin and the German national team. She participated at the 2015 IIHF Women's World Championship.2015 IIHF World Championship roster ==International career== Schuster was selected for the Germany women's national ice hockey team in the 2014 Winter Olympics. She recorded one assist.IIHF - Team Germany Stats - 2014 Olympics Schuster also played for Germany in the qualifying event for the 2014 Winter Olympics, and the 2010 OlympicsIIHF - Team Germany Stats - 2014 Olympic qualifyingIIHF - Team Germany Stats - 2010 Olympic qualifying As of 2014, Schuster has also appeared for Germany at four IIHF Women's World Championships.
